actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of Health and Human Services to award grants for Alzheimer's disease research.
short_title: United States-Israel Alzheimer's Disease Cooperation Act

summary.text:
United States-Israel Alzheimer's Disease Cooperation Act - Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services (HHS) to establish a program of grants to support research on the development and commercialization of tools, treatments, and cures for Alzheimer's disease and other dementias.

Requires eligible projects to be joint ventures between U.S. and Israeli non-governmental entities or the U.S. and Israeli governments.

Establishes an advisory board to monitor the method by which grants are awarded and to provide performance reviews of actions taken to carry out this Act.

titles.title: United States-Israel Alzheimer's Disease Cooperation Act
To authorize the Secretary of Health and Human Services to award grants for Alzheimer's disease research.
